connector.description: Make telemetry data available as an OPC UA server.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.milo-server.bindAddresse.name: camel.component.milo-server.bindAddresses
camel.component.milo-server.bindAddresse.description: Set the addresses of the local addresses the server should bind to

camel.component.milo-server.namespaceUri.name: camel.component.milo-server.namespaceUri
camel.component.milo-server.namespaceUri.description: The URI of the namespace, defaults to urn:org:apache:camel

camel.component.milo-server.path.name: camel.component.milo-server.path
camel.component.milo-server.path.description: The path to be appended to the end of the endpoint url. (doesn't need to start with '/')

camel.component.milo-server.port.name: camel.component.milo-server.port
camel.component.milo-server.port.description: The TCP port the server binds to

camel.component.milo-server.lazyStartPro.name: camel.component.milo-server.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.milo-server.lazyStartPro.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.milo-server.autowiredEna.name: camel.component.milo-server.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.milo-server.autowiredEna.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.milo-server.defaultCerti.name: camel.component.milo-server.defaultCertificateValidator
camel.component.milo-server.defaultCerti.description: Validator for client certificates using default file based approach

camel.component.milo-server.enableAnonym.name: camel.component.milo-server.enableAnonymousAuthentication
camel.component.milo-server.enableAnonym.description: Enable anonymous authentication, disabled by default

camel.component.milo-server.securityPoli.name: camel.component.milo-server.securityPoliciesById
camel.component.milo-server.securityPoli.description: Security policies by URI or name. Multiple policies can be separated by comma.

camel.component.milo-server.userAuthenti.name: camel.component.milo-server.userAuthenticationCredentials
camel.component.milo-server.userAuthenti.description: Set user password combinations in the form of user1:pwd1,user2:pwd2 Usernames and passwords will be URL decoded

camel.component.milo-server.usernameSecu.name: camel.component.milo-server.usernameSecurityPolicyUri
camel.component.milo-server.usernameSecu.description: Set the UserTokenPolicy used when One of: [None] [Basic128Rsa15] [Basic256] [Basic256Sha256] [Aes128_Sha256_RsaOaep] [Aes256_Sha256_RsaPss]
